//: competent skirmisher whose main purpose is to alert the rest of the unit to the presence of a player
description: A heavily modified body of a canine, barely a shell of its former self that has been marred by unintelligable symbols and machinery. A suite of infernal sensory equiptment is mounted where its head once was and taut hydraulic limbs are attatched to its torso. While it can no longer bite as easily, the blades attached to its legs appear to more than make up for this.

//: sack of hp that wants to crush you to death or at least hold you down for others to beat on. fortunately quite clumsy
description: The majestic and already terrifying moose, now twisted into some sort of ponderous industrial monstrosity. A pneumatic jaw hangs heavy from its head, snatching and pulverizing organic matter for use by its dark masters. Some sort of inscrutible script has been scrawled across its armored plating in a faintly glowing text.

//: fairly average statline but has a decent attack that prevents it from being entirely ignored
name: grafter grunt
description: A human, ruthlessly crammed into what appears to be a combat exoskeleton, armed with a crackling integrated shock baton. From their absent, maniacal grin, they clearly gain pleasure from hurting others, every strike causing faint runes on their armor to glow brightly.

//: heavy duty brute with a wicked attack, excels at knocking down walls. like the fetch, wasn't entirely intended for combat and is a bit clumsy
name: grafter sledge
description: A towering horror that looks like the fusion of several human bodies and a variety of machines, stitched together in a hideous mass. Hydraulic muscles hiss in time with the pulsing of eerie runes inscribed on its thick armor plating, and a buzzsaw attatched to one of its forearms purrs ominously.

//: support unit. brings some much-needed ranged ability
name: grafter prelate
description: A small being hidden inside the folds of a beautiful swirling robe, a sharp juxtaposition with the chaos around it, though no less touched by machinery. Levitating slightly off the ground, it uses its telekinetic ability to facilitate the construction of new cyborgs, and when cornered, hammers its enemies with psychic blasts.

special_attacks.monster_message: %1$s telekineticly gathers nearby debris and hurls them at %3$s!

name: grafter hierarch
description: A mysterious creature cloaked in a stunningly beautiful esoteric shroud. Underneath the swirls of fabric you catch a glimpse of frail ethereal body, being kept alive by machinery only a little more graceful than what is attatched to those around it. Are these entities the architects of this madness? Or are they victims themselves?

special_attacks.monster_message: %1$s telekineticly gathers nearby debris and hurls them at %s!
